text: The 1949–50 NBA season was the second season for the Rochester Royals in the National Basketball Association (NBA). ==Draft picks== Round Pick Player Position Nationality School/Club Team 1 10 Frank Saul F/G Seton Hall 2 – Jack Coleman F/C Louisville ==Roster== {| class="toccolours" style="font-size: 95%; width: 100%;"|} |- ! colspan="2" style="background-color: #FFFFFF; color: #0046AD; text-align: center;" | Rochester Royals 1949–50 roster |- style="background-color: #D0103A; color: #FFFFFF; text-align: center;" ! 51–17 ==Playoffs== ===Central Division Tiebreaker=== Rochester Royals vs. Minneapolis Lakers: Lakers win series 1-0 *Game 1 @ Rochester: Minneapolis 78, Rochester 76 ===Central Division Semifinals=== *(2) Rochester Royals vs. (3) Fort Wayne Pistons: Pistons win series 2-0 *Game 1 @ Rochester: Fort Wayne 90, Rochester 84 *Game 2 @ Fort Wayne: Fort Wayne 79, Rochester 78 (OT) ==Awards and records==
